summary: App with month-based tiles and an archive/history view; user requests UI tweaks and a fix to show older months' history.
known_issues: History cannot be seen for old months (older months' history not visible/accessible).

existing_features.title: Update the Overview Archive UI so the selected month name is displayed inside a clear, tile-like element (within the Archive area) rather than being only part of a long button label.
Relocate and redesign the month archive selection control to a more intuitive placement and layout so it does not dominate the Overview tab content while still being easily discoverable.

Fix the History tab so users can view transaction history for older months directly from the History screen (without requiring a tile click from Overview) by providing month/year selection controls and applying them to the History filtering logic.

new_feature_requests.summary: Display the month name inside each respective month tile.
Move/relocate the month archive option to a more appropriate (better) place in the UI.
Fix: history for old months is not visible/accessible; ensure older months' history can be seen.

projectName: Improve month archive UI and restore access to older months in History
